result.title: Critical Making social responsibility framework for maker space innovation activities
result.description: D 61 Critical Making social responsibility framework for maker space innovation activities M12A summary report of the Critical Making social responsibility framework will be created The main aim of the report is to support the evaluation of case actions in WPs 36 In addition to internal usage the report will also contribute to a broader knowledge on how to develop the MoRRI indicators for the purpose of analysing grassroots innovations Therefore the report will be published online at the CM web site and will be communicated to other relevant ongoing Swafs projects eg SuperMoRRI
